card.title: 5 Series Laptops
card.description: The intersection of power & a great price. Built with vivid displays, extreme processors & cutting-edge GPUs.

card.title: 7 Series Laptops

card.title: Pro Series Laptops
card.description: Experience top-tier power with our flagship lineup of laptops boasting NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 40 Series GPUs.
